captions.text: Buzzfeed Presents: How do guys flirt?
- I have no idea what I'm doing.
- I think I'm pretty good at flirting.
- If you're a cute girl, we are just so

thankful a cute girl is
spending time with us.
- Everybody flirts differently,

which is why it's hard to
know when people are flirting.

- I need that moment
where her friend says,
"Oh, she likes you."

A Stanford University study
found that computers were

more successful at detecting
flirting than humans.
- Eye contact is like the primal flirt.
That's like the...
You look down the barrel,
and someone's like, "I feel you".
- It's such a powerful, intimate thing

to make prolonged eye
contact with someone.

- Make the eye contact,
but then you're like,
"Oh, look at that chandelier.
"Hmm, what's going on over here?
"They look like they're having fun.
"Oh, hi you."

- I try to get a little
hand contact of some kind.
You know, because then it's like you're
introducing yourself as sexual partner?
- It's hard as a guy.

You don't wanna come off as
too pushy or touchy or feely.

- I feel like you're not
allowed to touch somebody,

pretty much ever, because
you don't know them yet.

- It's such a weird difference
between how you talk to
someone you might be interested in
versus how you talk to your buddies.
- Kinda lower your voice a little bit,
so she could pay attention.

- When you talk to a girl
you gotta kind of like
drop your voice so you sound tough.
When most people are like, "Hey!"
But with girls you gotta be like this.

A study by JDate and
Christian Mingle found that
men more than women believe cell phones
make it easier to flirt.
- If you just text from the heart,

you should be able to text
straight to her heart.
- Not dick pics, I'm not going there.
You can leave your dick out of this, guys.
- You don't wanna make it so

unthought-out that you
just say something like,
"You up?" or, "Sup, girl?"
- The three little cloud dots come up

and then they go away
for a couple seconds,

and you're like, "Oh
my God, what happened?"

And then they come back,
and you're like "Ah!"
- My favorite flirty emoji...
- You can give like a nice,

"Yeah" but this is also
a little bit suggestive.

- Sometimes the heart
eyes guy is pretty nice.
- Guitar, saxophone, guy surfing.

To me, this is just like,
"Hey, he's a fun guy."
- I'll do like a winking frowny face.
"Hey girl, what you doin' tonight?"

It will get a response
of, "What does this mean?"
- If someone could explain to me

how you flirt on Tinder,
I would love to know.
- I'm picky choosy when I'm sober,

but when it's Saturday night
and I've had a couple shots

I'm just everyone, match,
match, match, match.

- There's some element
of speed, cause you're

flippin' though people
like they're playing cards.
And then you're like, "This one!"

And then it matches
and you're like, "Ahh!"

And you like word vomit
out something quick.
Last thoughts

- Flirtation and attraction
is more of an accumulation
of experiences and not like a video game

where you beat the level,
then get to the next level.
- You just have to get out there,
and fail a couple times.
- Flirting is a fun thing you get to do.
And if you keep doing it with somebody,

then they might actually
make out with you.
And that's the best.

Music: Voice of Spring. Warner
/ Chappell Production Music
How do girls flirt?

comments.author: FlashakaViolet

comments.text:
I see flirting with girls kind of like how I see a game of high stakes 
poker. You have to read your "opponent" and their body language, how they 
act, and what they say. You at the same time make your own bets and ante 
with what you say, do, or if rather or not you should  try to make physical 
contact with the girl. Sometimes though if you are lucky, the girl ends up 
making the first move. That is like winning in a poker game simply because 
the other players caused the main opponent with the better hand to fold 
because they became intimidated or got bluffed out and folded when they 
shouldn't have. Or in this case you got lucky and a couple of potential 
cock blockers at the bar came up, offended the women, and she came home 
with you. Although allot of women really don't realize that if they really 
want a man all they have to do is go up to and talk to them like anyone 
else. If the guy is talking to you and you have a good conversation going, 
then he will probably go home with you if you ask. The whole cultural 
stigma of the man being the only one who should ask the women out in my 
opinion is stupid. This isn't the early 1900's or prior. We are in an equal 
gender society now (or at least working toward and getting very close to 
that) and things should be addressed as so. However now a days it's finally 
getting to the point where men sleeping around with dozens of women is 
finally seen as an equally bad thing. I don't know.. call me an idiot but I 
get annoyed or pissed off when I see or hear about a guy that sleeps with 
different women every other night but then calls a women a whore because 
she wont stay with one man. Sorry but if we want gender equality the same 
standard should apply. I've never cheated on a women. I've came close but I 
stopped myself. But basically the best way to flirt in my opinion is by 
using the true and oldest nature of it. Start by subtle and even normal 
touching in normal social relationships. You then gauge their reaction and 
if they seem relaxed, cool, or better yet happy about that slight touch you 
do a little bit more and go from there.﻿

comments.text:
Honestly, guys make eye contact with me so little in my life, that when 
they do it's amazing. Like even when I'm talking directly to them and only 
them, they won't really look me in the eye.
I became friends with this guy last year, and even though I knew he didn't 
have any feelings for me, he would look me directly in the eye when I 
talked to him like he was enraptured by what I was saying. And it made me 
so flustered! It was a great feeling but it was so powerful and pronounced 
because of how rarely it happened.
So needless to say, I was impressed. Make eye contact!﻿
